SELECT cou.s_name AS courseInfo, t_name AS courseTeacher, nianji AS courseClass, s_erjifenlei AS course, o_number AS orderNum, o_paymoney AS payMoney, o_status AS orderStatus, stu.s_name AS payName, o.create_time AS payTime
FROM tb_order o INNER JOIN tb_course cou ON o.`s_id` = cou.`s_id` INNER JOIN tb_student stu ON o.`s_id` = stu.`s_id` INNER JOIN tb_teacher t ON o.`t_id` = t.`t_id` INNER JOIN tb_nianji n ON o.`nianji_id` = n.`nianji_id`
